fields.title: I really love this product!
fields.content: Great product! Keeps your skin smooth. No fragrance, which I really like. I think it would be great on all skin type since I have combo skin.

fields.title: Great sunscreen!
fields.content:
Both my daughter and I really, really, love this sunscreen! 

It's soft on the skin, it's great under makeup and because it's also moisturizing and yet doesn't feel too heavy on the skin, we don't mind reapplying it every couple of hours! Yes, we're supposed to re-apply sunscreen every two to three hours and even when indoors. This is specially true if you're using serums!

fields.title: Great summer sunscreen!
fields.content: This is a great sunscreen for summer, light on the skin and yet effective!

fields.title: Love this!
fields.content: Stocks tend to run low, though.

fields.title: What a gift!
fields.content: I love this product and best of all, it was a present from my mum!

fields.title: Great for any season!
fields.content: This is a gentle, moisturizing hybrid mineral sunscreen! One of my favourite sunscreens and it's a staple our household!
